text: The Uruguay Open is a tennis tournament held in Montevideo, Uruguay since 2005. The event is part of the ATP Challenger Tour and is played on outdoor clay courts. ==Past finals== ===Singles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion
